country.country_description: Xa-lok is a lush planet with diverse ecosystems and many resources. The inhabitants of Xa-lok are friendly and welcoming, and they have a strong sense of community.
country.people_description: The people of Xa-lok are a diverse and multicultural population. They have a strong sense of tradition and are very proud of their heritage.
country.language_description: Xa-lokian is a unique language, with its own unique grammar and phonology. It is a language of many nuances, and it is very difficult to learn.
